## Extension Checklist
<!-- For extension-related PRs, ensure you've completed the following -->

- [ ] Updated `versionCode` in `build.gradle.kts`
- [ ] Added `isNsfw = true` flag if applicable
- [ ] Tested the extension by compiling and running through Android Studio
- [ ] Extension follows the coding standards (uses common utilities where applicable)
- [ ] No hardcoded strings for common selectors (uses `SelectorConstants` if applicable)
- [ ] Date parsing uses `DateParser` utility
- [ ] Status parsing uses `StatusParser` utility
- [ ] Proper error handling implemented

## Testing
<!-- Describe how you tested your changes -->

- [ ] Compiled successfully
- [ ] Tested on device/emulator
- [ ] Verified search functionality
- [ ] Verified chapter list loading
- [ ] Verified content loading
- [ ] Checked for memory leaks
